markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Eradicate Undeath](/Spells.aspx?ID=420)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 392 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart. Each undead creature in the area takes 4d12 positive damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d12.
name: Eradicate Undeath

summary: A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart.
summary_markdown: A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart.
text: Eradicate Undeath Source Core Rulebook pg. 392 4.0 Domain Death Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 30-foot cone Saving Throw basic Fortitude --- A massive deluge of life energy causes the undead to fall apart. Each undead creature in the area takes 4d12 positive damage. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.
